metadata.feature_description: Manages directories that should be included in search crawling operations

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Settings > Site Settings > Search > Crawling tab
steps.expected: Crawling tab should be visible with Included Directories section
steps.actual: Crawling tab opened successfully showing URL Paths, Duplicates, Included Directories, and Excluded Directories sections

steps.expected: Should see list of included directories with directory paths displayed
steps.actual: Included Directories section visible showing 'Images/' directory with a delete icon, and 'Add Directory' button available

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Add directory to included list using folder picker

steps.action: Click 'Add Directory' button in Included Directories section
steps.actual: Folder picker opened with dropdown and Cancel/Save buttons

steps.action: Expand folder picker to view available folders
steps.expected: Should see folder tree with available directories
steps.actual: Folder tree expanded showing Site Root with folders: Badges, Groups, Images, RenamedSecureFolder, Templates, Users

steps.action: Select 'Templates' folder from the folder picker
steps.expected: Templates folder should be selected and displayed in the dropdown
steps.actual: Templates folder selected and shown in the dropdown field

steps.action: Click Save button to add the directory
steps.expected: Directory should be added to the included list
steps.actual: Templates directory successfully added to the Included Directories list alongside existing Images/ directory

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Add already included directory and verify duplicate error

steps.action: Click 'Add Directory' button and select 'Images' folder (already in the list)
steps.expected: Images folder should be selectable in the folder picker
steps.actual: Images folder selected in the folder picker dropdown

steps.action: Click Save button to attempt adding the duplicate directory
steps.expected: Should display error message indicating directory is already included
steps.actual: Error toast notification appeared: 'Directory duplicated. This directory Images/ is already added'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Remove directory from included list with confirmation

steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared with message 'Are you sure you want to delete Templates?' with No and Yes buttons

steps.expected: Directory should be removed from the included list
steps.actual: Templates directory successfully removed from the Included Directories list, only Images/ remains

observations: The folder picker UI works correctly but requires JavaScript clicks due to overlay positioning issues with standard click interactions
Error messages are displayed as toast notifications that may disappear quickly
The deletion confirmation dialog provides clear Yes/No options for user confirmation
Directory paths are displayed with trailing slashes (e.g., 'Images/') in the list view
